channel.title: Comments on: Dealing with the “The text, ntext, or image pointer value conflicts with the column name specified.” error from Visual Foxpro
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Funny, my colleague sent me the error again and I made a Google search and this was the first link I found.
item.content:encoded: Funny, my colleague sent me the error again and I made a Google search and this was the first link I found.
